message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Alice, your offer was kind, but doesn't make sense with the inflation. Let's be realistic: I'll take a bit more this round to make up for losses later.
Bob, this offer still gives you a decent share considering the inflation will hit you harder next round.
Alice, it's my last chance to get a reasonable deal. This offer considers the inflation and gives us both something.
